name: JZ
text:
Planned Work
STATION IMPROVEMENTS | 3:45 AM Sat, Jul 7 to 10 PM Sun, Jul 8
No [J] trains between Crescent St, Brooklyn and Jamaica Center, Queens

[E] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[J] Service operates between Broad St and Crescent St.

[SB] Buses make all [J] stops between Crescent St and 121 St and connect with the
[E] at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

Travel Alternatives
For service between Crescent St and 121 St, take a [SB] bus.
• Transfer between [J] trains and [SB] buses at Crescent St.

For Sutphin Blvd/Archer Av and Jamaica Center, take the [E] instead.
• Transfer between [E] trains and [SB] buses at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

Show Shuttle Bus Stops

StationShuttle Bus StopBus
Crescent St [J]Fulton St at Crescent St —
Cypress HillsJamaica Av at Hemlock St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)Q56
Crescent St at Jamaica Av (to Crescent St) —
75 St-Elderts LnJamaica Av at 75 St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)Q56
Jamaica Av at Dexter Ct (to Crescent St)Q56
85 St-Forest PkwyJamaica Av at 85 St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)Q56
Jamaica Av at 86 St (to Crescent St)Q56
Woodhaven BlvdJamaica Av at Woodhaven BlvdQ56
104 StJamaica Av at 104 StQ56
111 StJamaica Av at 111 StQ56
121 StJamaica Av at 121 StQ56
Jamaica-Van Wyck [E] Van Wyck Service Rd at 89 Av —


Alternate travel note:
For JFK Airport AirTrain, use the [A] at Howard Beach-JFK via transfer at Broadway Junction.

Note: Jamaica Center-bound platform at 121 St is closed for renovation.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 3:45 AM Sat, Jul 7 to 10 PM Sun, Jul 8
Crescent-bound [J] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Crescent St-bound** [J].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.
**No [J] trains between Crescent St and Jamaica Center during this time.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
